steps.nodeStepDescription:
SUROS lightweight red dot sights. 
Improves weapon handling.

SUROS ranged combat scope. 
Improves range.
This weapon has increased stability.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
Improved accuracy while airborne.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.
This weapon gains better target acquisition.
Crouching grants improved accuracy and stability, as well as reduced aim time and flinch-under-fire.
It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.
Reduces the severity of this weapon's recoil.
Optical zoom length is increased while crouched.
Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.
Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
This weapon can be fired in full auto mode.
A larger magazine.
Reload this weapon quickly.
This weapon is effective at an extended range.
Increases weapon stability.
Reload this weapon even faster.
Improved range and accuracy.

SUROS projection sight. 
Improves weapon handling.

SUROS irons with projection sight. 
Improves weapon handling.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.
Switch weapons faster. Move quicker while aiming.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.

Ceramic-jacketed rounds ricochet on hard surfaces.
Their extreme density lets you carry more rounds in reserve.
Added mass slows down weapon handling.
This weapon causes kinetic damage.
